name: Tamaneko
description: An interactive Vue.js game inspired by Tamagotchi, where you can take care of an adorable virtual kitten.

name: Deliveboo
description: A team project developed during the Boolean course: Deliveboo, a complete food-delivery platform featuring restaurant management, order processing, and online payments.

name: SendCuteEcards
description: A Vue.js website for sending fun ecards: choose your favorite card and send it by email in just a few clicks.
